io.spine.server.aggregate

    • Method Detail

      • rootClass

        public java.lang.Class<? extends AggregateRoot> rootClass()
        Obtains the aggregate root class of this part class.

      • findConstructor

        protected java.lang.reflect.Constructor<A> findConstructor()
        Obtains the constructor for the passed aggregate part class.

        The part class must have a constructor with ID and AggregateRoot parameters.

        Returns the constructor if the first parameter is aggregate ID and the second constructor parameter is subtype of the AggregateRoot For example: 

        

 // A user-defined AggregateRoot:
 class CustomAggregateRoot extends AggregateRoot{...}

 // An AggregatePart for the CustomAggregateRoot:
 class CustomAggregatePart extends AggregatePart<...>{

     // The expected constructor:
     CustomAggregatePart(AnAggregateId id, CustomAggregateRoot root){...}
     }

        Throws IllegalStateException in other cases.

        Overrides:
        findConstructor in class EntityClass<A extends AggregatePart>
        Returns:
        the constructor
        Throws:
        ModelError - if the entity class does not have the required constructor
